NEVER AGAIN!  Was definitely not as reviewed by other Yelpers.   After 3 days of trying to sit at the bar, we finally accepted a side table.  No seat available.  The waiter provided me with a seat from a departing guest.  He suggested 3 different dishes and we accepted.  While waiting for our tapas, the owner stepped out of the bar and demanded I return his chair for a guest waiting at the bar.  What a big TURN OFF!   Immediately our waiter was cordial enough to provide another seat.   I thought the food at it's best was mediocre and cold.  Even though the Mercado is an excellent focal point, in comparison to Quimet Quimet the atmosphere and hospitality was lackluster.  Price wise by far the most expensive of all the tapas we had during our visit to Barcelona.  Bring cash.  No credit cards accepted.  Disappointed.
